                    throws G2AccessException

getModule

public Module getModule(Symbol moduleName)
                 throws G2AccessException
Retrieves a module by name. Returns null if no such module exists
Parameters:
moduleName - The name of the module. This can be null.
Returns:
A Module with this value for the TOP-LEVEL-MODULE attribute.
